title: Shoei RF-1400 Full-Face Motorcycle Helmet - Matte Black
description: The Shoei RF-1400 Full-Face Motorcycle Helmet in Matte Black is the pinnacle of helmet engineering, designed for riders who demand the best in protection, comfort, and performance. Constructed with an advanced Integrated Matrix Plus (IMPACT) shell, the RF-1400 offers exceptional durability and impact resistance. This helmet features a multi-density EPS liner that absorbs impact energy effectively, providing you with the utmost protection during your rides. The 3D Max-Dry II™ interior system ensures superior moisture-wicking and comfort by keeping you cool and dry, while the CWR-F2 Shield with Pinlock® EVO system guarantees a clear, fog-free view of the road. The RF-1400 also includes a state-of-the-art ventilation system for optimal airflow, keeping you comfortable in all riding conditions. With an aerodynamic design to minimize drag and reduce wind noise, this helmet is perfect for both high-speed track sessions and everyday street riding. The Shoei RF-1400 is also equipped with an emergency quick-release system for easy removal in case of an accident. Whether you’re a seasoned rider or a newcomer, the RF-1400 provides everything you need for a safe and enjoyable riding experience.
key_features: Integrated Matrix Plus (IMPACT) Shell Construction for Durability
Multi-Density EPS Liner for Advanced Impact Absorption
3D Max-Dry II™ Interior for Superior Moisture-Wicking
CWR-F2 Shield with Pinlock® EVO System for a Clear, Fog-Free View
Advanced Ventilation System for Optimal Airflow
Aerodynamic Design to Minimize Drag and Reduce Wind Noise
Emergency Quick-Release System for Easy Helmet Removal

title: Shoei RF-1400 Full-Face Motorcycle Helmet - Gloss White
description: Experience the ultimate in motorcycle helmet design with the Shoei RF-1400 Full-Face Motorcycle Helmet in Gloss White. This high-performance helmet is crafted from Shoei’s Integrated Matrix Plus (IMPACT) shell material, which combines multiple layers of advanced fibers to create a helmet that is both strong and lightweight. The RF-1400 helmet features a multi-density EPS liner that is designed to absorb and dissipate impact energy, providing the highest level of protection for riders. The 3D Max-Dry II™ interior lining ensures superior moisture management, keeping you dry and comfortable on the road. The helmet’s CWR-F2 Shield is equipped with a Pinlock® EVO insert for a fog-free and clear riding experience. The advanced ventilation system offers adjustable intake and exhaust vents for optimal airflow, enhancing rider comfort in various weather conditions. Additionally, the RF-1400’s aerodynamic shell design reduces wind noise and drag, making it an excellent choice for both track days and daily commutes. The helmet also includes an emergency quick-release system for safe and efficient helmet removal in case of an emergency. Upgrade your riding gear with the Shoei RF-1400 for unmatched safety and performance.

title: Shoei RF-1400 Full-Face Motorcycle Helmet - Matte Titanium
description: The Shoei RF-1400 Full-Face Motorcycle Helmet in Matte Titanium combines advanced safety features with sleek, modern aesthetics. This premium helmet features Shoei’s Integrated Matrix Plus (IMPACT) shell construction, which blends advanced materials to create a helmet that is both lightweight and exceptionally strong. The multi-density EPS liner offers advanced impact absorption, ensuring maximum safety for riders. The 3D Max-Dry II™ interior system provides superior comfort with its moisture-wicking properties, keeping you dry and comfortable even on long rides. The CWR-F2 Shield with Pinlock® EVO lens offers a clear, fog-free view of the road, and the advanced ventilation system features adjustable intake and exhaust vents for optimal airflow. The aerodynamic design reduces wind noise and drag, making the RF-1400 ideal for both high-speed track sessions and everyday riding. Additionally, the helmet includes an emergency quick-release system for easy removal in emergencies. Enhance your riding experience with the Shoei RF-1400 Full-Face Motorcycle Helmet in Matte Titanium, designed for riders who demand excellence.
